registerDrone.name: Register Drone
registerDrone.commandOutput: User {user} registered as a drone with ID #{droneId}.

unregisterDrone.name: Unregister Drone
unregisterDrone.commandOutput: User {user} unregistered as a drone (former ID #{droneId}).
